channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: CIROA Beauty
channel.desc: Elevate your everyday self-care with wonderful beauty formulas from CIROA.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Dyson
channel.desc: Vacuum your home with help from the iconic and much-loved British brand Dyson. We will be showcasing unique packages with added accessories, as well as discovering Dyson's new innovative technology.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: CIROA Beauty
channel.desc: Elevate your everyday self-care with wonderful beauty formulas from CIROA.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Morning Show
channel.desc: Wake up to QVC! We've chosen products from across all our ranges to ensure there is something for everyone to enjoy. Tune in to see special guests too.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Morning Style with Katy
channel.desc: Join Katy and our trusted stylists and fashion experts as we help you create your perfect wardrobe, showing you how to bring key pieces and different looks together to showcase your personal style.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: FitFlop Footwear
channel.desc: Discover FitFlop, which brings you a range of bio-mechanically engineered sandals, trainers and more that support you from the ground up, so you can feel comfortable and look great all day.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Clever Cleaning with Dyson
channel.desc: Join us for an hour of clever cleaning and discover innovative, cutting-edge technology from the experts at Dyson, with lots of handy hints and tips to help you to clean smarter around your home.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Margaret Dabbs London
channel.desc: Pamper your hands and feet with innovative hand and footcare formulas from international podiatrist and foot expert Margaret Dabbs.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: My Hair Doctor
channel.desc: Join us for My Hair Doctor from Guy Parsons, an industry professional whose knowledge of hair and scalp health, plus his hairdressing skills has enabled him to create this premium haircare range.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Skechers Footwear
channel.desc: Step out in style in Skechers! Renowned for their on-trend, sporty designs, you can now find their fab shoes at QVC too.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Sosandar Fashion
channel.desc: Unveil your chic side with Sosandar! Discover flattering, trendy designs created for real life with longer lengths and unique styles to make you feel sexy, feminine, and confident.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Gatineau
channel.desc: A specialist in skincare, Gatineau offers innovative and complete beauty treatment regimens to suit all skin types, for the busy women of today.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Clogau Jewellery
channel.desc: Every item in this stunning selection of gold jewellery contains rare Welsh gold from the Clogau St David's Gold Mine - the mine that has provided gold for Royal wedding rings.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Annie Haak Jewellery
channel.desc: Discover Annie Haak Jewellery, a gorgeous range of fine designs comprising necklaces, pendants, earrings, bracelets and more. A great gift at any idea, you'll love what Annie Haak has to offer.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Alison Young
channel.desc: Join Alison Young as she takes us through vitamins and supplements that can help you feel your very best. Tune in for tips and tricks, recommendations to suit your lifestyle and more.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: New Season Apricot Clothing
channel.desc: Join us to discover the Apricot fashion styles that your wardrobe needs to help you transition smoothly into the coming season.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: QVC Selection
channel.desc: With specially chosen products from across the QVC range, there's something for everyone in the QVC Selection.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Beauty Loves...
channel.desc: Love beauty? Tune in to see our exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to love.

channel.desc: Elevate your style with Apricot's new season fashion. Discover trend-led pieces and signature prints that promise unique, feminine looks for every woman.

channel.title: Tools for the Home and Garden
channel.desc: Whether it's for the inside or the outside, help is at hand when it comes to tackling those essential DIY jobs around the home and garden, including unique products and demonstrations.

channel.name: QVC UK

channel.desc: Create a warm and cosy sanctuary in your home, with the Cozee Home range of snuggly bedding, throws and accessories offering comfort and coziness in your home.

channel.desc: Elevate your style with Apricot's new season fashion. Discover trend-led pieces and signature prints that promise unique, feminine looks for every woman.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: HoMedics Personal Wellness
channel.desc: Relax and unwind as we explore HoMedics latest massage range, designed to help you relieve any feeling of muscle tension and stiffness from the comfort of your own home.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Liz Earle Gift of Good Skin
channel.desc: Enjoy the gift of good skin with a little help from the Naturally Active Skincare range from Liz Earle - designed to cleanse, hydrate and protect skin all year round.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Home Top Offers with Dyson
channel.desc: Tune in to discover our top offers in homeware and spruce up your home for less. Discover innovative appliances from Dyson including vacuums, fans and more to make life a little easier.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: New Season Apricot Clothing
channel.desc: Join us to discover the Apricot fashion styles that your wardrobe needs to help you transition smoothly into the coming season.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: In the Studios with Marla Wynne
channel.desc: Step into the studio with MarlaWynne's latest fashion-forward collection. Explore versatile pieces perfect for layering. Mix, match, and create your ideal capsule wardrobe.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Ruth Langsford New Leisurewear
channel.desc: Make down time more special in chic leisurewear designs from the Ruth Langsford collection. You'll find the perfect outfits for off-duty days.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Moda In Pelle
channel.desc: Discover fashionable footwear from Moda In Pelle which combines affordable luxury and complete comfort for you.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Australian Bodycare
channel.desc: This Australian Bodycare range is inspired by the ancient traditions of the Aborigines who discovered the effects of natural ingredients. Find cleansing and caring products for your skin.
